content.en: Smart Agriculture: Researchers are exploring how modern smart technologies can be used to remotely manage and automate agricultural activities. They are leveraging artificial intelligence and analytics to analyze operational data and provide new insights for improved decision making in agriculture. Additionally, they are integrating IoT technology with other technologies to enhance agriculture practices and operations. These advancements aim to revolutionize farming processes, optimize resources, and improve crop management in smart agriculture.
content.da: Smart Landbrug: Forskere undersøger, hvordan moderne smarte teknologier kan bruges til fjernstyring og automatisering af landbrugsaktiviteter. De udnytter kunstig intelligens og analyser til at analysere driftsdata og give nye indsigter for bedre beslutningstagning i landbruget. Derudover integrerer de IoT-teknologi med andre teknologier for at forbedre landbrugspraksis og operationer. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at revolutionere landbrugsprocesser, optimere ressourcer og forbedre afgrødeforvaltning i smart landbrug.
